Name: Erel Segal-Halevi
AboutMe:
I am a Ph.D. student in Bar Ilan University, computer science department.

My research topic is Fair Division of Land. It is related to the classic problem of fair cake-cutting, which is a multi-disciplinary topic connecting mathematics, economics and computer science,

I am always happy to discuss any topic related to land division or fair cake-cutting. If you have a new idea in these topics and need a partner for brain-storming, feel free to contact me :)

The answers I receive in the Stack Exchange websites are very useful, and I often cite them in papers. Some examples:

  • Fair and Square: Cake-cutting in two dimensions, working paper.
  • Envy-Free Cake-Cutting in Two Dimensions, presented in AAAI 2015.
  • Waste makes Haste: Envy-Free Cake-Cutting in Finite Time with Free Disposal, presented in AAMAS 2015.

Email: erelsgl@gmail.com
